00026 void NonmemTranslator::parsePopAnalysis( const DOMElement* pop_analysis )
00027 {
00028   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029   // Determine the value of <pop_analysis::is_estimation>.
00030   // If "yes", it requires certain other attributes to be given as well.
00031   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032   if( !pop_analysis->hasAttribute( XML.X_IS_ESTIMATION ) )
00033     {
00034       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00035       snprintf( mess, 
00036         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00037         "Missing <%s::%s> attribute.", XML.C_POP_ANALYSIS, XML.C_IS_ESTIMATION );
00038       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__);
00039       throw e;
00040     }
00041   const XMLCh * xml_is_estimation = pop_analysis->getAttribute( XML.X_IS_ESTIMATION );
00042   myIsEstimate = ( XMLString::equals( xml_is_estimation, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
00043 
00044 
00045   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046   // Attributes that are required when <pop_analysis::is_estimation> is "yes".
00047   //
00048   // * approximation = {fo, foce, laplace, std_two_stage, global_two_stage,
00049   // *                  iterative_two_stage, nonparametric}
00050   // * pop_size
00051   // * is_estimation = {yes, no}
00052   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053   if( myIsEstimate )
00054     {
00055       //
00056       // Finding out the approximation method.
00057       //
00058       if( !pop_analysis->hasAttribute( XML.X_APPROXIMATION ) )
00059     {
00060       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00061       snprintf( mess, 
00062             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00063             "Missing <%s::%s> attribute.", XML.C_POP_ANALYSIS, XML.C_APPROXIMATION );
00064       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__);
00065       throw e;
00066     }
00067       const XMLCh * xml_approx = pop_analysis->getAttribute( XML.X_APPROXIMATION );
00068       
00069       if( XMLString::equals( xml_approx, XML.X_FO ) )
00070     setApproximation( FO );
00071       else if( XMLString::equals( xml_approx, XML.X_FOCE ) )
00072     setApproximation( FOCE );
00073       else if( XMLString::equals( xml_approx, XML.X_LAPLACE ) )
00074     setApproximation( LAPLACE );
00075       else if( XMLString::equals( xml_approx, XML.X_STD_TWO_STAGE ) )
00076     setApproximation( STD_TWO_STAGE );
00077       else if( XMLString::equals( xml_approx, XML.X_GLOBAL_TWO_STAGE ) )
00078     setApproximation( GLOBAL_TWO_STAGE );
00079       else if( XMLString::equals( xml_approx, XML.X_ITERATIVE_TWO_STAGE ) )
00080     setApproximation( ITERATIVE_TWO_STAGE );
00081       else if( XMLString::equals( xml_approx, XML.X_NONPARAMETRIC ) )
00082     myIsNonparam = true;
00083       else
00084     {
00085       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00086       snprintf( mess, 
00087             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00088             "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".", 
00089             XML.C_POP_ANALYSIS, 
00090             XML.C_APPROXIMATION, 
00091            XMLString::transcode(xml_approx) );
00092       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__);
00093       throw e;
00094     }
00095     }
00096 
00097   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098   // Optional attributes that matter when <pop_analysis::is_estimation> is "yes".
00099   //
00100   // * is_eta_out = {yes, "no"}
00101   // * is_restart = {yes, "no"}
00102   // * mitr
00103   // * sig_digits
00104   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105   if( myIsEstimate )

00110       xml_is_eta_out = pop_analysis->getAttribute( XML.X_IS_ETA_OUT );

00119     }

00124         {

00126           snprintf( mess,

00128             "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".",

00131                       __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00132           throw e;
00133         }
00134     }
00135       const XMLCh* xml_sig_digits;
00136       if( pop_analysis->hasAttribute( XML.X_SIG_DIGITS ) )
00137     {
00138       xml_sig_digits = pop_analysis->getAttribute( XML.X_SIG_DIGITS );
00139       if( XMLString::stringLen( xml_sig_digits ) > 0 )
00140         {
00141           if( !XMLString::textToBin( xml_sig_digits, mySigDigits ) )
00142         {
00143           char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00144           snprintf( mess, 
00145                 SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00146                 "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".", 
00147                 XML.C_POP_ANALYSIS, 
00148                 XML.C_SIG_DIGITS, 
00149                XMLString::transcode( xml_sig_digits ) );
00150           SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, 
00151                       __LINE__, __FILE__);
00152           throw e;
00153               
00154         }
00155           if( !( mySigDigits > 0 && mySigDigits < 9 ) )
00156         {
00157           char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00158           snprintf( mess, 
00159                 SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00160                 "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".  Valid range: (1-8)", 
00161                 XML.C_POP_ANALYSIS, XML.C_SIG_DIGITS, XMLString::transcode( xml_sig_digits )  );
00162           SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, 
00163                       __LINE__, __FILE__);
00164           throw e;
00165         }
00166           myIndEpsilon = pow( 10.0, -(mySigDigits + 1.0) );
00167           myPopEpsilon = myIndEpsilon;
00168         }
00169     }
00170     }

00406     // Iterate though the list of <label>s.

00426 
00427     // The label name should have been already registered in the symbol table

00430     if( name == Symbol::empty() )
00431       {

00437             throw e;
00438       }
00439     // The synonym is an optional attribute.
00440     // Register the value into the symbol table if it is given.
00441     if( xml_label->hasAttribute( XML.X_SYNONYM ) )
00442       {
00443         const XMLCh* xml_synonym = xml_label->getAttribute( XML.X_SYNONYM );
00444         char * c_synonym = XMLString::transcode( xml_synonym );
00445         name->synonym = string( c_synonym );
00446         delete c_synonym;
00447       }
00448     delete c_name;
00449       }
00450   }

00528     char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];

00530           SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00531           "The number of <%s> elements does not match with the <%s::%s> attribute value.", 
00532           XML.C_VALUE, XML.C_THETA, XML.C_LENGTH );
00533     SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00534     throw e;
00535       }
00536     for( int i=0; i<myThetaLen; i++ )
00537       {
00538     char str_val[128];
00539         bool isFixed = false;
00540     DOMElement * value = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( value_list->item(i) );
00541     if( value->hasAttribute( XML.X_FIXED ) )
00542       {
00543         const XMLCh* xml_fixed = value->getAttribute( XML.X_FIXED );
00544         isFixed = (XMLString::equals( xml_fixed, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
00545       }
00546     const XMLCh* xml_val = value->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
00547     if( XMLString::stringLen( xml_val ) == 0 )
00548       strcpy( str_val, valueDefault );
00549     else
00550       {
00551         char * tmp_c_val = XMLString::transcode( xml_val );
00552         strcpy( str_val, tmp_c_val );
00553         delete tmp_c_val;
00554       }
00555     sym_theta->initial[0][i] = str_val;
00556     sym_theta->fixed[0][i]   = isFixed;
00557       }
00558     //<low>
00559     DOMNodeList * theta_low_list = theta->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_LOW );
00560     if( theta_low_list->getLength() > 1 )
00561       {
00562     char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00563     snprintf( mess,
00564           SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00565           "Multiple <%s> elements found under <%s>.", 
00566           XML.C_LOW, XML.C_THETA );
00567     SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00568     throw e;
00569       }
00570     if( theta_low_list->getLength() < 1 )
00571       {
00572     char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00573     snprintf( mess,
00574           SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00575           "Missing <%s> element under <%s>.", 
00576           XML.C_LOW, XML.C_THETA );
00577     SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00578     throw e;
00579       }
00580     DOMElement * theta_low = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( theta_low_list->item(0) );
00581     value_list = theta_low->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00582     if( myThetaLen != value_list->getLength() )
00583       {
00584     char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00585     snprintf( mess,
00586           SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00587           "The number of <%s> elements does not match with the <%s::%s> attribute value.", 
00588           XML.C_VALUE, XML.C_THETA, XML.C_LENGTH );
00589     SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00590     throw e;
00591       }
00592     for( int i=0; i<myThetaLen; i++ )
00593       {
00594     char str_val[128];
00595     DOMElement * value = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( value_list->item(i) );
00596     const XMLCh* xml_val = value->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
00597     if( XMLString::stringLen( xml_val ) == 0 )
00598       strcpy( str_val, valueDefault );
00599     else
00600       {
00601         char * tmp_c_val = XMLString::transcode( xml_val );
00602         strcpy( str_val, tmp_c_val );
00603         delete tmp_c_val;
00604       }
00605     if( sym_theta->fixed[0][i] )
00606       sym_theta->lower[0][i] = sym_theta->initial[0][i];
00607         else
00608       sym_theta->lower[0][i] = str_val;
00609       }
00610 
00611     //<up>
00612     DOMNodeList * theta_up_list = theta->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_UP );
00613     if( theta_up_list->getLength() > 1 )
00614       {
00615     char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00616     snprintf( mess,
00617           SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00618           "Multiple <%s> elements found under <%s>.", 
00619           XML.C_UP, XML.C_THETA );
00620     SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00621     throw e;
00622       }
00623     if( theta_up_list->getLength() < 1 )
00624       {
00625     char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00626     snprintf( mess,
00627           SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00628           "Missing <%s> element under <%s>.", 
00629           XML.C_UP, XML.C_THETA );
00630     SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00631     throw e;
00632       }
00633     DOMElement * theta_up = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( theta_up_list->item(0) );
00634     value_list = theta_up->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00635     if( myThetaLen != value_list->getLength() )
00636       {
00637     char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00638     snprintf( mess,
00639           SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00640           "The number of <%s> elements does not match with the <%s::%s> attribute value.", 
00641           XML.C_VALUE, XML.C_THETA, XML.C_LENGTH );
00642     SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00643     throw e;
00644       }
00645     for( int i=0; i<myThetaLen; i++ )
00646       {
00647     char str_val[128];
00648     const XMLCh* xml_val = value_list->item(i)->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
00649     if( XMLString::stringLen( xml_val ) == 0 )
00650       strcpy( str_val, valueDefault );
00651     else
00652       {
00653         char * tmp_c_val = XMLString::transcode( xml_val );
00654         strcpy( str_val, tmp_c_val );
00655         delete tmp_c_val;
00656       }
00657         if( sym_theta->fixed[0][i] )
00658       sym_theta->upper[0][i] = sym_theta->initial[0][i];
00659         else
00660       sym_theta->upper[0][i] = str_val;
00661       }
00662 
00663     // step values
00664     for( int i=0; i<myThetaLen; i++ )
00665       {
00666     if( sym_theta->fixed[0][i] )
00667       sym_theta->step[0][i] = "0.0";
00668     else
00669       {
00670         double tmp_dbl = fabs( atof( sym_theta->upper[0][i].c_str() ) 
00671                    - atof( sym_theta->lower[0][i].c_str() ) ) / 1000.0;
00672         char tmp_char[256];
00673         snprintf( tmp_char, 256, "%f", tmp_dbl );
00674         sym_theta->step[0][i] = string( tmp_char );
00675       }
00676       }
00677   }
00678 
00679   //-------------------------------------------
00680   // <omega>
00681   //-------------------------------------------
00682   DOMNodeList * omega_list = pop_analysis->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_OMEGA );
00683   int nOmegaSpecs = omega_list->getLength();
00684   //if( nOmegaSpecs > 1 )
00685   //{
00686   //    // v0.1 supports only one (full) Omega specification
00687   //    char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00688   //    snprintf( mess, 
00689   //        SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00690   //        "Multiple <%s> elements found.",
00691   //           XML.C_OMEGA );
00692   //    SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00693   //    throw e;
00694       //}  
00695   if( nOmegaSpecs < 1 )
00696     {
00697       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00698       snprintf( mess, 
00699         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00700         "Missing <%s> element.",
00701         XML.C_OMEGA );
00702       SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00703       throw e;
00704     }
00705   myOmegaDim.resize( nOmegaSpecs );
00706   myOmegaOrder.resize( nOmegaSpecs );
00707   myOmegaStruct.resize( nOmegaSpecs );
00708   myOmegaSameAsPrev.resize( nOmegaSpecs );
00709   
00710   DOMElement * omega;
00711   for (int ii = 0; ii < nOmegaSpecs; ii++)    // loop through blocks
00712   {
00713      omega = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( omega_list->item(ii) );
00714      if( !omega->hasAttribute( XML.X_DIMENSION ) )
00715        {
00716      char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00717      snprintf( mess, 
00718            SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00719            "Missing <%s::%s> attribute.",
00720            XML.C_OMEGA, XML.C_DIMENSION );
00721      SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00722      throw e;
00723        }
00724      const XMLCh* xml_omega_dim = omega->getAttribute( XML.X_DIMENSION );
00725      if( !XMLString::textToBin( xml_omega_dim, myOmegaDim[ii] ) )
00726        {
00727      char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00728      snprintf( mess,
00729            SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00730            "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".", 
00731            XML.C_OMEGA, XML.C_DIMENSION, XMLString::transcode( xml_omega_dim ) );
00732      SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00733      throw e;
00734        }
00735       if( omega->hasAttribute( XML.X_SAME_AS_PREVIOUS ) )
00736        {
00737      const XMLCh* xml_omega_sameAsPrev = omega->getAttribute( XML.X_SAME_AS_PREVIOUS );
00738      myOmegaSameAsPrev[ii] = (XMLString::equals( xml_omega_sameAsPrev, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
00739        }
00740       if( !omega->hasAttribute( XML.X_STRUCT ) )
00741        {
00742      char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00743      snprintf( mess, 
00744            SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00745            "Missing <%s::%s> attribute.",
00746            XML.C_OMEGA, XML.C_STRUCT );
00747      SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00748      throw e;
00749        }
00750      const XMLCh* xml_omega_struct = omega->getAttribute( XML.X_STRUCT );
00751      if( XMLString::equals( xml_omega_struct, XML.X_DIAGONAL ) )
00752        {
00753      myOmegaStruct[ii] = Symbol::DIAGONAL;
00754      myOmegaOrder[ii] = myOmegaDim[ii];
00755        }
00756      else if( XMLString::equals( xml_omega_struct, XML.X_BLOCK ) )
00757        {
00758      myOmegaStruct[ii] = Symbol::TRIANGLE;
00759      myOmegaOrder[ii] = series( 1, 1, myOmegaDim[ii] );
00760        }
00761      else
00762        {
00763      char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00764      snprintf( mess,
00765            SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00766            "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".", 
00767            XML.C_OMEGA, XML.C_STRUCT, XMLString::transcode( xml_omega_struct ) );
00768      SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00769      throw e;
00770        }
00771   }  
00772   // end of first "loop through blocks"
00773 
00774 
00775   Symbol * sym_omega = table->insertSymmetricMatrix( nonmem::OMEGA, myOmegaStruct, myOmegaDim, Symbol::SYSTEM, Symbol::READONLY );
00776  
00777 
00778   DOMElement * omega_in;
00779   DOMNodeList * value_list;
00780   for (int ii = 0; ii < nOmegaSpecs; ii++)    // loop through blocks
00781   {
00782      omega = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( omega_list->item(ii) );
00783     //<in>
00784     DOMNodeList * omega_in_list = omega->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_IN );
00785     //if( omega_in_list->getLength() > 1 )
00786     //  {
00787     //  char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00788     //  snprintf( mess, 
00789     //        SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00790     //        "Multiple <%s> elements found under <%s>.",
00791     //        XML.C_OMEGA, XML.C_IN );
00792     //  SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00793     //  throw e;
00794     //  }
00795     if( omega_in_list->getLength() < 1 )
00796       {
00797         char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00798         snprintf( mess, 
00799               SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00800               "Missing <%s> element under <%s>.",
00801               XML.C_OMEGA, XML.C_IN );
00802         SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00803         throw e;
00804      }
00805 
00806     omega_in = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( omega_in_list->item(0) );  //there is only one set of items (value)
00807  
00808     //
00809     // Omega specification contains the minimal representation of the matrix.
00810     //
00811     //     /                 \
00812       //     |  a11  a12  a13  |
00813       // A = |  a21  a22  a23  |
00814       //     |  a31  a32  a33  |
00815       //     \                 /
00816       //
00817       // For full, the list contains the LOWER half in the row major order.
00818       // For diagonal, only the diagonal elements.
00819       //
00820       // If A is full, the user-given list will contain elements in the following order:
00821       // A' = { a11, a21, a22, a31, a32, a33 }
00822       //
00823       // xxxPredModel's constructor expects the list containing elements of
00824       // the UPPER half in the row major order.
00825       //
00826       // Thus, A has to be reorganized and stored in an internal array in the following order:
00827       // A" = { a11, a21, a31, a22, a32, a33 }
00828       //
00829       value_list = omega_in->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
00830 
00831       if( myOmegaOrder[ii] != value_list->getLength() )
00832     {
00833       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00834       snprintf( mess,
00835             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00836             "The number of <%s> elements does not match with the <%s::%s> attribute value.", 
00837             XML.C_VALUE, XML.C_OMEGA, XML.C_LENGTH );
00838       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00839       throw e;
00840     }
00841 
00842       DOMElement * value;
00843       if( myOmegaStruct[ii] == Symbol::TRIANGLE )
00844     {
00845       // First construct a full n by n matrix.
00846       valarray<string> omega_in_full ( myOmegaDim[ii] * myOmegaDim[ii] );
00847       valarray<bool> omega_fix_full( myOmegaDim[ii] * myOmegaDim[ii] );
00848       for( int i=0, cnt=0; i<myOmegaDim[ii]; i++ )
00849         {
00850           for( int j=0; j<=i; j++, cnt++ )
00851         {
00852           char str_val[128];
00853           bool isFixed = false;
00854           value = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( value_list->item(cnt) );
00855           if( value->hasAttribute( XML.X_FIXED ) )
00856             {
00857               const XMLCh* xml_fixed = value->getAttribute( XML.X_FIXED );
00858               isFixed = (XMLString::equals( xml_fixed, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
00859             }
00860           const XMLCh* xml_val = value->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
00861 
00862           if( XMLString::stringLen( xml_val ) == 0 )
00863             strcpy( str_val, valueDefault );
00864           else
00865             {
00866               char * tmp_c_val = XMLString::transcode( xml_val );
00867               strcpy( str_val, tmp_c_val );
00868               delete tmp_c_val;
00869             }
00870           //omega_in_full[ j + i*dim ] = a[cnt]; // filling a lower triangle element
00871           omega_in_full [ i + j*myOmegaDim[ii] ] = str_val; // filling a upper triangle element
00872           omega_fix_full[ i + j*myOmegaDim[ii] ] = isFixed;
00873         }
00874         }
00875       // Then, extract only the upper half in the row major order.
00876       for( int i=0, cnt=0; i<myOmegaDim[ii]; i++ )
00877         {
00878           for( int j=i; j<myOmegaDim[ii]; j++, cnt++ )
00879         {
00880           sym_omega->initial[ii][cnt] = omega_in_full [ j + i * myOmegaDim[ii] ];
00881           sym_omega->fixed  [ii][cnt] = omega_fix_full[ j + i * myOmegaDim[ii] ];
00882         }
00883         }
00884     }
00885       else // diagonal case
00886     {
00887       for( int i=0; i<myOmegaDim[ii]; i++ )
00888         {
00889           char str_val[128];
00890           bool isFixed = false;
00891           value = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( value_list->item(i) );
00892           if( value->hasAttribute( XML.X_FIXED ) )
00893         {
00894           const XMLCh* xml_fixed = value->getAttribute( XML.X_FIXED );
00895           isFixed = (XMLString::equals( xml_fixed, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
00896         }
00897           const XMLCh* xml_val = value->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
00898 
00899           if( XMLString::stringLen( xml_val ) == 0 )
00900         strcpy( str_val, valueDefault );
00901           else
00902         {
00903           char * tmp_c_val = XMLString::transcode( xml_val );
00904           strcpy( str_val, tmp_c_val );
00905           delete tmp_c_val;
00906         }
00907           sym_omega->initial[ii][i] = str_val;
00908           sym_omega->fixed[ii][i]   = isFixed;
00909         }
00910     }
00911   }
00912 
00913   //-------------------------------------------
00914   // <sigma>
00915   //-------------------------------------------
00916   DOMNodeList * sigma_list = pop_analysis->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_SIGMA );
00917   int nSigmaSpecs = sigma_list->getLength();
00918   //if( nSigmaSpecs > 1 )
00919   //  { 
00920   //    // v0.1 supports only one (full) Sigma specification
00921   //    char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00922   //    snprintf( mess, 
00923   //        SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00924   //        "Multiple <%s> elements found.",
00925   //        XML.C_SIGMA );
00926   //    SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00927   //    throw e;
00928   //  }
00929   if( nSigmaSpecs < 1 )
00930     { 
00931       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00932       snprintf( mess, 
00933         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00934         "Missing <%s> element.",
00935         XML.C_SIGMA );
00936       SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00937       throw e;
00938     }
00939   mySigmaDim.resize( nSigmaSpecs );
00940   mySigmaOrder.resize( nSigmaSpecs  );
00941   mySigmaStruct.resize( nSigmaSpecs );
00942   mySigmaSameAsPrev.resize( nSigmaSpecs );
00943 
00944   DOMElement * sigma;
00945   for (int ii = 0; ii < nSigmaSpecs; ii++)    // loop through blocks
00946     {
00947   sigma = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( sigma_list->item(ii) );
00948   if( !sigma->hasAttribute( XML.X_DIMENSION ) )
00949     {
00950       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00951       snprintf( mess, 
00952         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00953         "Missing <%s::%s> attribute.",
00954         XML.C_SIGMA, XML.C_DIMENSION );
00955       SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00956       throw e;
00957     }
00958   const XMLCh* xml_sigma_dim = sigma->getAttribute( XML.X_DIMENSION );
00959   if( !XMLString::textToBin( xml_sigma_dim, mySigmaDim[ii] ) )
00960     {
00961       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00962       snprintf( mess,
00963         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00964         "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".", 
00965         XML.C_OMEGA, XML.C_DIMENSION, XMLString::transcode( xml_sigma_dim ) );
00966       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00967       throw e;
00968     }
00969   // SAME_AS_PREVIOUS  ---------------------------------------------
00970   if( sigma->hasAttribute( XML.X_SAME_AS_PREVIOUS ) )
00971     {
00972       const XMLCh* xml_sigma_sameAsPrev = sigma->getAttribute( XML.X_SAME_AS_PREVIOUS );
00973       mySigmaSameAsPrev[ii] = (XMLString::equals( xml_sigma_sameAsPrev, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
00974     }
00975   // --------------------------------------------------------------
00976   if( !sigma->hasAttribute( XML.X_STRUCT ) )
00977     {
00978       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00979       snprintf( mess, 
00980         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
00981         "Missing <%s::%s> attribute.",
00982         XML.C_SIGMA, XML.C_STRUCT );
00983       SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00984       throw e;
00985     }
00986   const XMLCh* xml_sigma_struct = sigma->getAttribute( XML.X_STRUCT );
00987   if( XMLString::equals( xml_sigma_struct, XML.X_DIAGONAL ) )
00988     {
00989       mySigmaStruct[ii] = Symbol::DIAGONAL;
00990       mySigmaOrder[ii] = mySigmaDim[ii];
00991     }
00992   else if( XMLString::equals( xml_sigma_struct, XML.X_BLOCK ) )
00993     {
00994       mySigmaStruct[ii] = Symbol::TRIANGLE;
00995       mySigmaOrder[ii] = series( 1, 1, mySigmaDim[ii] );
00996     }
00997   else
00998     {
00999       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01000       snprintf( mess,
01001         SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01002         "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".", 
01003         XML.C_SIGMA, XML.C_STRUCT, XMLString::transcode( xml_sigma_struct ) );
01004       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01005       throw e;
01006     }
01007   }  // end of first "loop through blocks"
01008 
01009   Symbol * sym_sigma = table->insertSymmetricMatrix( nonmem::SIGMA, mySigmaStruct, mySigmaDim, Symbol::SYSTEM, Symbol::READONLY );
01010 
01011 
01012   DOMNodeList * sigma_in_list;
01013   DOMElement * sigma_in;
01014   for (int ii = 0; ii < nSigmaSpecs; ii++)    // loop through blocks
01015     {
01016       sigma = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( sigma_list->item(ii) );
01017       //<in>
01018       sigma_in_list = sigma->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_IN );
01019     //if( sigma_in_list->getLength() > 1 )
01020     //  {
01021     //  char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01022     //  snprintf( mess, 
01023     //        SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01024     //        "Multiple <%s> elements found under <%s>.",
01025     //        XML.C_SIGMA, XML.C_IN );
01026     //  SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01027     //  throw e;
01028     //  }
01029     if( sigma_in_list->getLength() < 1 )
01030       {
01031     char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01032     snprintf( mess, 
01033           SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01034           "Missing <%s> element under <%s>.",
01035           XML.C_SIGMA, XML.C_IN );
01036     SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01037     throw e;
01038       }
01039  
01040 
01041     sigma_in = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( sigma_in_list->item(0) );
01042 
01043     //
01044     // Sigma specification contains the minimal representation of the matrix.
01045     //
01046     //     /                 \
01047       //     |  a11  a12  a13  |
01048       // A = |  a21  a22  a23  |
01049       //     |  a31  a32  a33  |
01050       //     \                 /
01051       //
01052       // For full, the list contains the LOWER half in the row major order.
01053       // For diagonal, only the diagonal elements.
01054       //
01055       // If A is full, the user-given list will contain elements in the following order:
01056       // A' = { a11, a21, a22, a31, a32, a33 }
01057       //
01058       // xxxPredModel's constructor expects the list containing elements of
01059       // the UPPER half in the row major order.
01060       //
01061       // Thus, A has to be reorganized and stored in an internal array in the following order:
01062       // A" = { a11, a21, a31, a22, a32, a33 }
01063       //
01064       DOMNodeList * value_list = sigma_in->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_VALUE );
01065       if( mySigmaOrder[ii] != value_list->getLength() )
01066     {
01067       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01068       snprintf( mess,
01069             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01070             "The number of <%s> elements does not match with the <%s::%s> attribute value.", 
01071             XML.C_VALUE, XML.C_SIGMA, XML.C_LENGTH );
01072       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01073       throw e;
01074     }
01075       if( mySigmaStruct[ii] == Symbol::TRIANGLE )
01076     {
01077       // First construct a full n by n matrix.
01078       valarray<string> sigma_in_full ( mySigmaDim[ii] * mySigmaDim[ii] );
01079       valarray<bool>   sigma_fix_full( mySigmaDim[ii] * mySigmaDim[ii] );
01080       for( int i=0, cnt=0; i<mySigmaDim[ii]; i++ )
01081         {
01082           for( int j=0; j<=i; j++, cnt++ )
01083         {
01084           char str_val[128];
01085           bool isFixed = false;
01086           DOMElement * value = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( value_list->item(cnt) );
01087           if( value->hasAttribute( XML.X_FIXED ) )
01088             {
01089               const XMLCh* xml_fixed = value->getAttribute( XML.X_FIXED );
01090               isFixed = (XMLString::equals( xml_fixed, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
01091             }
01092           const XMLCh* xml_val = value->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
01093 
01094           if( XMLString::stringLen( xml_val ) == 0 )
01095             strcpy( str_val, valueDefault );
01096           else
01097             {
01098               char * tmp_c_val = XMLString::transcode( xml_val );
01099               strcpy( str_val, tmp_c_val );
01100               delete tmp_c_val;
01101             }
01102           //sigma_in_full[ j + i*dim ] = str_val; // filling a lower triangle element
01103           sigma_in_full [ i + j*mySigmaDim[ii] ] = str_val; // filling a upper triangle element
01104           sigma_fix_full[ i + j*mySigmaDim[ii] ] = isFixed;
01105         }
01106         }
01107       // Then, extract only the upper half in the row major order.
01108       for( int i=0, cnt=0; i<mySigmaDim[ii]; i++ )
01109         {
01110           for( int j=i; j<mySigmaDim[ii]; j++, cnt++ )
01111         {
01112           sym_sigma->initial[ii][cnt] = sigma_in_full [ j + i * mySigmaDim[ii] ];
01113           sym_sigma->fixed  [ii][cnt] = sigma_fix_full[ j + i * mySigmaDim[ii] ];
01114         }
01115         }
01116     }
01117       else // diagonal case
01118     {
01119       for( int i=0; i<mySigmaDim[ii]; i++ )
01120         {
01121           char str_val[128];
01122           bool isFixed = false;
01123           DOMElement * value = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( value_list->item(i) );
01124           if( value->hasAttribute( XML.X_FIXED ) )
01125         {
01126           const XMLCh* xml_fixed = value->getAttribute( XML.X_FIXED );
01127           isFixed = (XMLString::equals( xml_fixed, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
01128         }
01129           const XMLCh* xml_val = value->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
01130 
01131           if( XMLString::stringLen( xml_val ) == 0 )
01132         strcpy( str_val, valueDefault );
01133           else
01134         {
01135           char * tmp_c_val = XMLString::transcode( xml_val );
01136           strcpy( str_val, tmp_c_val );
01137           delete tmp_c_val;
01138         }
01139           sym_sigma->initial[ii][i] = str_val;
01140           sym_sigma->fixed[ii][i]   = isFixed;
01141         }
01142     }
01143   }
01144   
01145   //-------------------------------------------
01146   // <eta>
01147   //-------------------------------------------
01148   // eta
01149   // NOTE: eta is not given by the user.  
01150   // eta's initial estimate is initialized to
01151   // 0.0 here.
01152   //-------------------------------------------
01153   myEtaLen = myOmegaDim.sum();
01154   char etaDefault[] = "0.0";
01155   Symbol * sym_eta = table->insertVector( nonmem::ETA, myEtaLen, Symbol::SYSTEM, Symbol::READONLY );
01156   for( int i=0; i<myEtaLen; i++ ) sym_eta->initial[0][i] = etaDefault;
01157   sym_eta->fixed[0] = false;
01158 
01159   //-------------------------------------------
01160   // <eps> 
01161   //-------------------------------------------
01162   myEpsLen = mySigmaDim.sum();
01163   char epsDefault[] = "0.0";
01164   Symbol * sym_eps = table->insertVector( nonmem::EPS, myEpsLen, Symbol::SYSTEM, Symbol::READONLY );
01165   for( int i=0; i<myEpsLen; i++ ) sym_eps->initial[0][i] = epsDefault;
01166   sym_eta->fixed[0] = false;
01167 
01168   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01169   // (Optional) Statistics elements
01170   //
01171   // <description>
01172   // <simulation>
01173   // <pop_stat>
01174   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01175 
01176   //-------------------------------------------
01177   // <description>
01178   //-------------------------------------------
01179   DOMNodeList * descriptions = pop_analysis->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_DESCRIPTION );
01180   myDescription = new char[ 128 ];
01181   strcpy( myDescription, "--- This file is generated by SPK Compiler ---" );
01182   if( descriptions->getLength() > 0 )
01183     {
01184       const XMLCh* description = descriptions->item(0)->getFirstChild()->getNodeValue();
01185       if( XMLString::stringLen( description ) > 0 )
01186     {
01187       delete [] myDescription;
01188       myDescription = XMLString::transcode( description );
01189     }
01190     }
01191 
01192   //-------------------------------------------
01193   // <simulation>
01194   //-------------------------------------------
01195   myIsSimulate = false;
01196   DOMNodeList * simulations = pop_analysis->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_SIMULATION );
01197   if( simulations->getLength() > 0 )
01198     {
01199       if( simulations->getLength() > 1 )
01200     {
01201       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01202       snprintf( mess, 
01203             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01204             "Multiple <%s> elements found.",
01205             XML.C_SIMULATION );
01206       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01207       throw e;
01208     }
01209       myIsSimulate = true;
01210       mySeed       = 0;
01211       DOMElement* simulation = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( simulations->item(0) );
01212       if( !simulation->hasAttribute( XML.X_SEED ) )
01213     {
01214       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01215       snprintf( mess, 
01216             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01217             "Missing <%s::%s> attribute.",
01218             XML.C_SIMULATION, XML.C_SEED );
01219       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01220       throw e;
01221     }
01222       const XMLCh* xml_seed = simulation->getAttribute( XML.X_SEED );
01223       if( !XMLString::textToBin( xml_seed, mySeed ) )
01224     {
01225       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01226       snprintf( mess, 
01227             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01228             "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".", 
01229             XML.C_SIMULATION, XML.C_SEED, XMLString::transcode(xml_seed) );
01230       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01231       throw e;
01232     }
01233 
01234       if( simulation->hasAttribute( XML.X_SUBPROBLEMS ) )
01235     {
01236       const XMLCh* xml_subproblems = simulation->getAttribute( XML.X_SUBPROBLEMS );
01237       if( !XMLString::textToBin( xml_subproblems, mySubproblemsN ) )
01238         {
01239           char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01240           snprintf( mess, 
01241             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01242             "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".", 
01243             XML.C_SIMULATION, XML.C_SUBPROBLEMS, XMLString::transcode(xml_subproblems) );
01244           SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01245           throw e;
01246         }
01247     }
01248     }
01249 
01250   //-------------------------------------------
01251   // <pop_stat>
01252   //-------------------------------------------
01253   DOMNodeList * pop_stat_list = pop_analysis->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_POP_STAT );
01254 
01255   // Statistics computation can be done only when the parameter estimation
01256   // is requested.
01257   if( pop_stat_list->getLength() > 0 && myIsEstimate )
01258     {
01259       if( pop_stat_list->getLength() > 1 )
01260     {
01261           char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01262       snprintf( mess, 
01263             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01264             "Multiple <%s> elements found.", 
01265             XML.C_POP_STAT );
01266           SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01267           throw e;
01268     }
01269       DOMElement * pop_stat = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( pop_stat_list->item(0) );
01270       if( !pop_stat->hasAttribute( XML.X_COVARIANCE_FORM ) && myIsStat )
01271     {
01272           char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01273       snprintf( mess, 
01274             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01275             "Missing <%s::%s> attribute.", 
01276             XML.C_POP_STAT, XML.C_COVARIANCE_FORM );
01277           SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01278           throw e;
01279     }
01280       const XMLCh* cov_form = pop_stat->getAttribute( XML.X_COVARIANCE_FORM ); // r, rsr, s
01281       if( XMLString::equals( cov_form, XML.X_COV_S ) )
01282     myCovForm = "S";
01283       else if( XMLString::equals( cov_form, XML.X_COV_RSR ) )
01284     myCovForm = "RSR";
01285       else if( XMLString::equals( cov_form, XML.X_COV_R ) )
01286     myCovForm = "R";
01287       else
01288     {
01289       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
01290       snprintf( mess, 
01291             SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen(),
01292             "Invalid <%s::%s> attribute value: \"%s\".", 
01293             XML.C_POP_STAT, XML.C_COVARIANCE_FORM, XMLString::transcode( cov_form )  );
01294       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
01295       throw e;
01296     }
01297 
01298       if( pop_stat->hasAttribute( XML.X_IS_ERR_OUT ) )
01299     {
01300       const XMLCh* xml_stderr = pop_stat->getAttribute( XML.X_IS_ERR_OUT );
01301       myIsStderr = (XMLString::equals( xml_stderr, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
01302     }
01303 
01304       if( pop_stat->hasAttribute( XML.X_IS_CORR_OUT ) )
01305     {
01306       const XMLCh* xml_correlation = pop_stat->getAttribute( XML.X_IS_CORR_OUT );
01307       myIsCorrelation = (XMLString::equals( xml_correlation, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
01308     }
01309 
01310       if( pop_stat->hasAttribute( XML.X_IS_COV_OUT ) )
01311     {
01312       const XMLCh* xml_cov = pop_stat->getAttribute( XML.X_IS_COV_OUT );
01313       myIsCov = (XMLString::equals( xml_cov, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
01314     }
01315 
01316       if( pop_stat->hasAttribute( XML.X_IS_INV_COV_OUT ) )
01317     {
01318       const XMLCh* xml_inv_cov = pop_stat->getAttribute( XML.X_IS_INV_COV_OUT );
01319       myIsInvCov = (XMLString::equals( xml_inv_cov, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
01320     }
01321 
01322       if( pop_stat->hasAttribute( XML.X_IS_CONF_OUT ) )
01323     {
01324       const XMLCh* xml_conf = pop_stat->getAttribute( XML.X_IS_CONF_OUT );
01325       myIsConfidence = (XMLString::equals( xml_conf, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
01326     }
01327 
01328       if( pop_stat->hasAttribute( XML.X_IS_COEF_OUT ) )
01329     {
01330       const XMLCh* xml_coef = pop_stat->getAttribute( XML.X_IS_COEF_OUT );
01331       myIsCoefficient = (XMLString::equals( xml_coef, XML.X_YES )? true : false );
01332     }
01333     }
01334   else
01335     {
01336       myIsStat = false;
01337       myIsStderr = false;
01338       myIsCorrelation = false;
01339       myIsCov = false;
01340       myIsInvCov = false;
01341       myIsConfidence = false;
01342       myIsCoefficient = false;
01343     }
01344 
01345   myIsStat = myIsStderr 
01346     || myIsCorrelation 
01347     || myIsCov 
01348     || myIsInvCov 
01349     || myIsConfidence 
01350     || myIsCoefficient;
01351 
01352   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01353   // Set trace levels.
01354   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01355   myIndTraceLevel = 0;
01356   myPopTraceLevel = 1;
01357 
01358   return;
01359 }
